title: Day 12 - The Treat
itunes:title: Day 12 - The Treat
itunes:subtitle: The 31 Days of Horror 2021
description:
Or would you prefer the trick?

***

Written by Samantha Arthurs and narrated by Alicia Atkins

***

Content warning: child death

***

Bonus episode: "I Don't Belong Here" written by Steve Rogers

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***
